alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 3:51AM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Hamilton and Northern Warren Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall at elevations greater than 2000 feet. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
